text:
"The Powerpuff Girls Movie" is a 2002 German-American animated comedy-mystery action superhero adventure family film based on the Cartoon Network animated television series "The Powerpuff Girls". this film is directed by series creator Craig McCracken and produced by Cartoon Network Studios and Warner Bros Pictures.
Story.
Townsville has been through crime. The Professor is buying ingredients to make girls for his experiment. As his lab monkey Jojo pushed him, breaking a vat of Chemical X, the girls were created. The Professor gave them their names; Blossom, Bubbles and Buttercup.
